a.detail: A 5-foot wide chasm cuts across the corridor
a.summary: A 5-foot wide chasm cuts across the corridor

c.detail: The walls here have been engraved with incoherent labyrinths
c.summary: The walls here have been engraved with incoherent labyrinths

e.detail: Several square holes are cut into the walls here
e.summary: Several square holes are cut into the walls here

i.detail:
Falling Block: DC 10 to find, DC 10 to disable;
    affects all targets within a 10 ft. square area, DC 14 save or take 2d10 damage

m.detail:
Magic Missle Trap: DC 15 to find, DC 15 to disable;
    one target, 1d10 force damage

n.detail:
Teleporter Crystal: DC 15 to find, DC 10 to disable;
    affects each creature which touches the crystal, DC 10 save or be teleported to another location

details.history: The dungeon was created by elves as a maze. It was eventually abandoned by its creators, and the dungeon has fallen to ruin and been rebuilt many times since then.

detail.room_features: A stair ascends to a catwalk hanging between the east and west walls, and a tile mosaic of a goddess of fate covers the floor

north.desc: Stuck Strong Wooden Door (DC 15 to break; 20 hp)

south.desc: Stuck Good Wooden Door (DC 15 to break; 15 hp)

detail.room_features: A sloped pit lined with iron spikes lies in the west side of the room, and someone has scrawled "In the Year of Prisms, when the Warrior is broken and the Bridge of Rings is broken, the Staff of Orbs shall be lost" on the west wall

monster: Silver Dragon Wyrmling (cr 2, mm 118); deadly, 450 xp

Treasure: 2200 cp, 800 sp, 60 gp, a leather mantle trimmed with lynx fur (25 gp), a portrait (of a male dwarf) in a wooden frame inlaid with a meandros of silver (25 gp), a set of ivory dice with copper pips (25 gp), Spell Scroll (Protection from Evil and Good) (common, dmg 200), Potion of Greater Healing (uncommon, dmg 187), 4 x Potion of Healing (common, dmg 187)
detail.room_features: A carved stone statue stands in the east side of the room, and someone has scrawled "I'd rather be at the Bloody Arrow" in dwarvish runes on the east wall

north.desc: Unlocked Strong Wooden Door (20 hp) (slides up)

south.desc: Stuck Strong Wooden Door (DC 15 to break; 20 hp)

hidden_treasure: Hidden (DC 15 to find) Trapped and Locked Good Wooden Chest (DC 20 to unlock, DC 20 to break; 15 hp)

Arrow Trap: DC 10 to find, DC 15 to disable;
    +4 to hit against one target, 1d10 piercing damage

1700 cp, 800 sp, 50 gp, a pewter rod engraved with elven script (25 gp), a stoneware cup painted with garden imagery (25 gp), an obsidian rod set with a rosette of garnet (25 gp), Dust of Sneezing and Choking (uncommon, dmg 166), Potion of Animal Friendship (uncommon, dmg 187), Potion of Greater Healing (uncommon, dmg 187)
detail.room_features: The room has a high domed ceiling, and a simple wooden table and lantern sit in the north-east corner of the room
trap:
Fire Spray: DC 10 to find, DC 10 to disable;
    affects all targets within a 20 ft. cone, DC 15 save or take 2d10 fire damage

west.desc: Stuck Simple Wooden Door (DC 10 to break; 10 hp)

settings.name: The Sanctum of the Lich Princess

wandering_monsters.1: Bugbear (cr 1, mm 33) and 1 x Goblin (cr 1/4, mm 166); medium, 250 xp, returning to their lair with plunder
wandering_monsters.2: Orc (cr 1/2, mm 246) and 1 x Half-ogre (cr 1, mm 238); deadly, 300 xp, lost and desperate
wandering_monsters.3: Gelatinous Cube (cr 2, mm 242); deadly, 450 xp, actively patrolling their territory
wandering_monsters.4: 4 x Goblin (cr 1/4, mm 166); deadly, 200 xp, gathered around an evil shrine
wandering_monsters.5: Gelatinous Cube (cr 2, mm 242); deadly, 450 xp, searching for an object stolen from their lair
wandering_monsters.6: Gelatinous Cube (cr 2, mm 242); deadly, 450 xp, scouting from another part of the dungeon
